name: pair-from-target
objective: Pair an iphone from the target device
description: User should be able to pair an iphone from the test device.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled - Bluetooth switcher is toggled on 'I'
- Bluetooth technoloy of the iphone device is activated and visible by other devices

steps.description: Click on the Bluetooth applet icon
Click on the 'Set Up a New Device' option to pair a new device and wait
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard appears and searching for devices. Available Bluetooth devices appears

steps.description: Click on the iphone device to pair

steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard shows a pin number. A notification is received by the iphone device for the acceptance of the pairing, with same pin number

steps.description: Accept the pairing on the iphone device, and then click 'Matches' on the target device
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard displays 'Successfully set up new device <device name>'. The added device appears in the menu of Bluetooth applet. The added device appears in the Devices field of Bluetooth panel.

author: zingile

name: pair-from-device
objective: Pair the target device from an iphone
description: User should be able to pair the target device from an iphone.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled and visible by others - Bluetooth & Visibility switchers are toggled on 'I'
- Bluetooth technology of the iphone device is activated

steps.description: Open the Bluetooth settings of the iphone device and scan for devices
Select the test device to pair (localhost-0 by default)
steps.expected: A notification appears on the screen of the target device.

steps.description: Open the notification and click on 'Matches' to accept the pairing
Accept the pairing on the iphone device
steps.expected: iphone device should appear in the device list of Bluetooth panel. The Android phone appears in the menu of Bluetooth applet

author: zingile

name: send
objective: The target device can send files to the iphone device
description: User should be able to send files to the iphone device.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled on the test device
- Bluetooth technology is enabled on the iphone device
- Test device is paired with the iphone device

steps.description: Choose a file and click on 'Select'
steps.expected: A notification appears on the iphone

steps.description: Accept the file and wait a while

author: zingile

name: receive
objective: The target device can receive files sent by the iphone device
description: User should be able to receive files sent by the iphone device.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled and visible by others : Blueooth & Visibiliy switcher are togled on 'I'
- Bluetooth technology is enabled on the iphone device

steps.description: Open a file with the iphone device and send it via Bluetooth
Select the test device as receiver
steps.expected: A notification appears on the test device

steps.description: Accept the file and wait a while

steps.expected: File can be open and is same as the version on the Android phone

author: zingile
